item.title: launchd timed jobs
item.description: TIL about scheduling timed jobs on MacOS through launchd. Each launchd job is described by a separate plist file, meaning you can manage launchd timed jobs by simply adding or removing a file. These files should be placed in certain folders according to the goal of the job: System tasks go to: /Library/LaunchDaemons/ if they need to run no matter if a user is logged in to the system or not.
